alert.note: Alert for Lake (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 18 at 10:10AM CST until February 19 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds gusting to 45 mph expected this afternoon then turning northwest this evening behind a cold front. * WHERE...Lake IL County. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 3 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Travel will be difficult for high profile vehicles. Additionally, in southern Lake County, lightly snow covered roads are possible due to blowing and drifting snow in mainly open areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers or squalls may accompany the highest gusts along the cold front this evening with bursts of heavy snow and sudden visibility reductions possible.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
